short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to get word definition by double-clicking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays a definition when a word is double-clicked. Definition history is viewable by clicking on the extension logo.

All definitions are obtained from the Merriam-Webster's CollegiateÂ® Dictionary with Audio API. This extension is free to use, however, one most obtain and enter an API key from the following link: https://dictionaryapi.com/register/index
